entries: A nivell 17, your patron bestows upon you a magical secret called an arcanum. Choose one {@filter 9th-level spell from the llista de conjurs de bruixot|spells|level=9|class=Warlock} as this arcanum.
You can cast your arcanum spell once without expending a spell slot. You must finish a long rest before you can do so again.

classFeature.name: Millora de Puntuació de Característica
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 19, pots incrementar en 2 una puntuació de característica, o bé incrementar en 1 dos puntuacions de característica (escull). No pots incrementar cap puntuació de característica per sobre de 20 mitjançant aquest tret.
Si el/la/li MM ho permet, pots no incrementar cap puntuació; a canvi, esculls una {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Competència Versàtil
entries: {@i tret de nivell 19 (augmenta Millora de Puntuació de Característica)}

Quan obtinguis el tret Millora de Puntuació de Característica de la teva classe, pots substituir una de les teves competències d'habilitat (qualsevol; no ha de ser de la teva classe) per una altra de la llista d'habilitats de la teva classe a nivell 1.
Aquest canvi representa l'atrofia en una de les teves habilitats ja que et centres en una altra.

classFeature.name: Eldritch Master
entries: A nivell 20, you can draw on your inner reserve of mystical power while entreating your patron to regain expended ranures de conjur. You can spend 1 minute entreating your patron for aid to regain all your expended ranures de conjur from your Màgia de Pacte feature. Once you regain ranures de conjur with this feature, you must finish a long rest before you can do so again.

subclassFeature.name: La Gran Fata
entries: Your patron is a lord or lady of the fey, a creature of legend who holds secrets that were forgotten before the mortal races were born. This being's motivations are often inscrutable, and sometimes whimsical, and might involve a striving for greater magical power or the settling of age-old grudges. Beings of this sort include the Prince of Frost; the Queen of Air and Darkness, ruler of the Gloaming Court; Titania of the Summer Court; her consort Oberon, the Green Lord; Hyrsam, the Prince of Fools; and ancient hags.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: La Gran Fata et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

subclassFeature.name: Presència Faèrica
entries: Començant a nivell 1, el teu patró et permet projectar la presència atractiva i terrorífica que pot tenir una fata. Com a acció, fas que tota criatura en un cub de 10 peus de costat centrat en tu salvi per Saviesa contra la teva CD de salvada de conjur de bruixot. Qui falli està {@condition charmed} per tu o bé {@condition frightened} de tu (escull) fins el final del teu proper torn.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Fugida Boira
entries: Començant a nivell 6, pots esvaïr-te en un núvol de boira. Quan rebis mal pots, com a reacció, tornar-te {@condition invisible} i teleportar-te fins a 60 peus en un espai desocupat que puguis veure. Romans {@condition invisible} fins l'inici del teu proper torn o fins que ataquis o llancis un conjur.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Defensa Engany
entries: Començant a nivell 10, el teu patró et permet redirigir la màgia mental dels teus enemics to volta cap a ells. Ets immune a ser {@condition charmed}; quan una criatura intenti fascinar-te pots, com a reacció, provar de tornar-li l'efecte. La criatura ha de salvar per Saviesa contra la teva CD de salvada de conjur de bruixot. Si falla, està {@condition charmed} per tu durant 1 minut o fins que rebi dany.

subclassFeature.name: Delirium Tremens
entries: Començant a nivell 14, pots enviar a una criatura a un regne d'il·lusió. Com a acció, escull una criatura que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu. Ha de salvar per Saviesa contra la teva CD de salvada de conjur de bruixot. Si falla, està {@condition charmed} per tu o {@condition frightened} de tu (escull) durant 1 minut o fins que se't trenqui la concentració (com si fos la d'un conjur). L'efecte acaba prematurament si la criatura rep dany.
Fins que acabi la il·lusió la criatura creu que està perduda en un reialme difuminat; en tries l'aparença. La criatura només pot veure i sentir-se a si mateixa, a tu, i a la il·lusió.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: L'Adversari
entries: Has establert un pacte amb un diable amb objectius malvats; no importa si vas en contra dels seus ideals. Aquests éssers volen la corrupció o destrucció de totes les coses, incloent-t'hi a tu. Els diables que poden establir un pacte són senyors i senyores com Demogorgones, Orcus, Fraz'Urb-luu, u Baphomet; els arxi-diables són especialment poderosos: Asmodeus, Dispater, Mephistopheles, i Belial, els adversaris de pou i els balors; a més dels ultroloths i altres amos dels yugoloths.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: L'Adversari et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

entries.caption: Conjurs Ampliats d'Adversari
rows: {@spell escut de foc}, {@spell paret de foc}

subclassFeature.name: Benedicció del Tenebrós
entries: Començant a nivell 1, quan deixes a una criatura hostil a 0 punts de vida, reps tants punts de vida temporals com el teu modificador de Carisma + el teu nivell de bruixot (mínim d'1).

subclassFeature.name: Sort del Tenebrós
entries: Començant a nivell 6, demanes al teu patró que canviï la sort al teu favor. Quan fas una tirada d'habilitat o de salvació, pots sumar-li {@dice d10}. Pots decidir sumar un cop facis la tirada, però ha de ser abans de resoldre-la.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Resiliència Infernal
entries: Començant a nivell 10, pots escollir un tipus de dany quan acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg. Obténs resistència a aquell tipus de dany fins que n'escullis un altre amb aquest tret. Aquesta resistència l'ignora el dany d'armes màgiques o platejades.

subclassFeature.name: Travessar els Inferns
entries: Començant a nivell 14, quan impactes a una criatura with an attack, you can use this feature to instantly transport the target through the lower planes. The creature disappears and hurtles through a nightmare landscape.

At the end of your next turn, the target returns to the space it previously occupied, or the nearest unoccupied space. If the target is not a fiend, it takes {@damage 10d10} de dany psíquic as it reels from its horrific experience.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: The Great Old One
entries: Your patron is a mysterious entity whose nature is utterly foreign to the fabric of reality. It might come from the Far Realm, the space beyond reality, or it could be one of the elder gods known only in legends. Its motives are incomprehensible to mortals, and its knowledge so immense and ancient that even the greatest libraries pale in comparison to the vast secrets it holds. The Great Old One might be unaware of your existence or entirely indifferent to you, but the secrets you have learned allow you to draw your magic from it. Entities of this type include Ghaunadar, called That Which Lurks; Tharizdun, the Chained God; Dendar, the Night Serpent; Zargon, the Returner; Great Cthulhu; and other unfathomable beings.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: The Great Old One et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

entries.caption: Conjurs Ampliats de Great Old One
rows: {@spell xiuxiuejos de disbauxa}, {@spell Riure Horrible de la Tashalaughter}

subclassFeature.name: Awakened Mind
entries: Començant a nivell 1, your alien knowledge gives you the ability to touch the minds of other creatures. You can telepathically speak to any creature que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. You don't need to share a language with the creature for it to understand your telepathic utterances, but the creature must be able to understand at least one language.

subclassFeature.name: Entropic Ward
entries: A nivell 6, you learn to magically ward yourself against attack and to turn an enemy's failed strike into good luck for yourself. When a creature makes an attack roll against you, pots, com a reacció, impose disadvantage on that roll. If the attack misses you, your next attack roll against the creature has advantage if you make it before the end of your next turn.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Thought Shield
entries: Començant a nivell 10, your thoughts can't be read by telepathy or other means unless you allow it. You also have resistance to psychic damage, and whenever a creature deals psychic damage to you, that creature takes the same amount of damage that you do.

subclassFeature.name: Create Thrall
entries: A nivell 14, you gain the ability to infect a humanoid's mind with the alien magic of your patron. Pots, com a acció, to touch an {@condition incapacitated} humanoid. That creature is then {@condition charmed} per tu until a {@spell remove curse} spell is cast on it, the {@condition charmed} condition is removed from it, or you use this feature again.
You can communicate telepathically with the {@condition charmed} creature as long as the two of you are on the same plane of existence.

subclassFeature.name: The Undying
entries: Death holds no sway over your patron, who has unlocked the secrets of everlasting life, although such a prize—like all power—comes at a price. Once mortal, the Undying has seen mortal lifetimes pass like the seasons, like the flicker of endless days and nights. It has the secrets of the ages to share, secrets of life and death. Beings of this sort include Vecna, Lord of the Hand and the Eye; the dread Iuz; the lich-queen Vol; the Undying Court of Aerenal; Vlaakith, lich-queen of the githyanki; and the deathless wizard Fistandantalus.
In the Realms, Undying patrons include Larloch the Shadow King, legendary master of Warlock's Crypt, and Gilgeam, the God-King of Unther.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: The Undying et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

entries.caption: Conjurs Ampliats de Undying
rows: {@spell feign death}, {@spell parlar amb els morts}
{@spell aura of life}, {@spell abjurar la mort}

subclassFeature.name: Among the Dead
entries: Començant a nivell 1, you learn the {@spell spare the dying} cantrip, which counts as a warlock cantrip for you. You also have advantage on saving throws against any disease.

A més, undead have difficulty harming you. If an undead targets you directly with an attack or a harmful spell, that creature ha de salvar per Saviesa against your spell save DC (an undead needn't make the save when it includes you in an area effect, such as the explosion of {@spell bola de foc}). Si falla, the creature must choose a new target or forfeit targeting someone instead of you, potentially wasting the attack or spell. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this effect durant 24 hores. An undead is also immune to this effect durant 24 hores if you target it with an attack or a harmful spell.

subclassFeature.name: Defy Death
entries: Començant a nivell 6, you can give yourself vitality when you cheat death or when you help someone else cheat it. You can regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d8} + el teu modificador de Constitució (mínim d'1 punt de vida) when you succeed on a salvada de mort or when you stabilize a creature with {@spell spare the dying}.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Undying Nature
entries: Començant a nivell 10, you can hold your breath indefinitely, and you don't require food, water, or sleep, although you still require rest to reduce {@condition exhaustion} and still benefit from finishing short and long rests.
A més, you age at a slower rate. For every 10 years that pass, your body ages only 1 year, and you are immune to being magically aged.

subclassFeature.name: Indestructible Life
entries: Quan arribes a nivell 14, you partake some of the true secrets of the Undying. En el teu torn, pots, com a acció bonus, to regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d8} + el teu nivell de bruixot. A més, if you put a severed body part of yours back in place when you use this feature, the part reattaches.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: The Fathomless
entries: You have plunged into a pact with the deeps. An entity of the ocean, the Elemental Plane of Water, or another otherworldly sea now allows you to draw on its thalassic power. Is it merely using you to learn about terrestrial realms, or does it want you to open cosmic floodgates and drown the world?

Perhaps you were born into a generational cult that venerates the Fathomless and its spawn. Or you might have been shipwrecked and on the brink of drowning when your patron's grasp offered you a chance at life. Whatever the reason for your pact, the sea and its unknown depths call to you.
Entities of the deep that might empower a warlock include krakens, ancient water elementals, godlike hallucinations dreamed into being by kuo-toa, merfolk demigods, and sea hag covens.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: {@i tret de Fathomless a nivell 1}
The Fathomless et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

entries.caption: Conjurs Ampliats de Fathomless
rows: {@spell Mà d'en Bigby} (appears as a tentacle), {@spell con de fred}

subclassFeature.name: Gift of the Sea
entries: {@i tret de Fathomless a nivell 1}
You gain a swimming speed of 40 feet, i pots respirar sota l'aigua.

subclassFeature.name: Tentacle of the Deeps
entries: {@i tret de Fathomless a nivell 1}

You can magically summon a spectral tentacle that strikes at your foes. Com a acció bonus, you create a 10-foot-long tentacle at a point que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu. The tentacle lasts durant 1 minut or until you use this feature to create another tentacle.

When you create the tentacle, you can make a atac màgic cos a cos against one creature within 10 feet of it. On a hit, L'objectiu rep {@damage 1d8} de dany de fred, and its speed is reduced by 10 feet fins l'inici del teu proper torn. Quan arribes a nivell 10 in this class, the damage increases to {@dice 2d8}.
Com a acció bonus en el teu torn, you can move the tentacle fins a 30 peus and repeat the attack.
You can summon the tentacle a number of times equal to el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Guardian Coil
entries: {@i tret de Fathomless a nivell 6}

Your Tentacle of the Deeps can defend you and others, interposing itself between them and harm. When you or a creature que puguis veure takes damage while within 10 feet of the tentacle, pots, com a reacció, choose one of those creatures and reduce the damage to that creature by {@dice 1d8}. Quan arribes a nivell 10 in this class, the damage reduced by the tentacle increases to {@dice 2d8}.

subclassFeature.name: Oceanic Soul
entries: {@i tret de Fathomless a nivell 6}

You are now even more at home in the depths. You gain resistance to cold damage. A més, when you are fully submerged, any creature that is also fully submerged can understand your speech, and you can understand theirs.

subclassFeature.name: Grasping Tentacles
entries: {@i tret de Fathomless a nivell 10}

You learn the spell {@spell Evard's black tentacles}. It counts as a warlock spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of spells you know. You can also cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to do so quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

Whenever you cast this spell, your patron's magic bolsters you, granting you a number of punts de vida temporals equal to el teu nivell de bruixot. Moreover, damage can't break your concentration on this spell.

subclassFeature.name: Fathomless Plunge
entries: {@i tret de Fathomless a nivell 14}

You can magically open temporary conduits to watery destinations. Com a acció, you can teleport yourself and up to five other willing creatures que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. Amid a whirl of tentacles, you all vanish and then reappear up to 1 mile away in a body of water you've seen (pond size or larger) or within 30 feet of it, each of you appearing in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of the others.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: The Genie
entries: You have made a pact with one of the rarest kinds of genie, a noble genie. Such entities rule vast fiefs on the Elemental Planes and have great influence over lesser genies and elemental creatures. Noble genies are varied in their motivations, but most are arrogant and wield power that rivals that of lesser deities. They delight in turning the table on mortals, who often bind genies into servitude, and readily enter into pacts that expand their reach.
You choose your patron's kind or determine it randomly, using the Genie Kind table.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: {@i tret de Genie a nivell 1}

The Genie lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The Genie Expanded Spells table shows the genie spells that are added to the llista de conjurs de bruixot for you, along with the spells associated in the table with your patron's kind: dao, djinni, efreeti, or marid.

entries.caption: Conjurs Ampliats de Genie
rows: {@spell detectar el bé i el mal}

subclassFeature.name: Genie's Vessel
entries: {@i tret de Genie a nivell 1}

Your patron gifts you a magical vessel that grants you a measure of the genie's power. The vessel is a Tiny object, and you can use it as a spellcasting focus for your warlock spells. You decide what the object is, or you can determine what it is randomly by rolling on the Genie's Vessel table.
While you are touching the vessel, you can use it in the following ways:
The vessel's AC equals your spell save DC. Its hit points equal el teu nivell de bruixot plus el teu bonus de competència, and it is immune to poison and psychic damage.

If the vessel is destroyed or you lose it, you can perform a 1-hour ceremony to receive a replacement from your patron. This ceremony can be performed during a short or long rest, and the previous vessel is destroyed if it still exists. The vessel vanishes in a flare of elemental power when you die.

subclassFeature.name: Elemental Gift
entries: {@i tret de Genie a nivell 6}

You begin to take on characteristics of your patron's kind. You now have resistance to a damage type determined by your patron's kind: bludgeoning (dao), thunder (djinni), fire (efreeti), or cold (marid).

A més, com a acció bonus, you can give yourself a flying speed of 30 feet that lasts durant 10 minuts, during which pots flotar. You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Sanctuary Vessel
entries: {@i tret de Genie a nivell 10}

When you enter your Genie's Vessel via the Bottled Respite feature, you can now choose up to five willing creatures que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu, and les criatures designades are drawn into the vessel with you.
Com a acció bonus, you can eject any number of creatures from the vessel, and everyone is ejected if you leave or die or if the vessel is destroyed.

A més, anyone (including you) who remains within the vessel for at least 10 minutes gains the benefit of finishing a short rest, and anyone can add el teu bonus de competència to the number of hit points they regain if they spend any Hit Dice as part of a short rest there.

subclassFeature.name: Limited Wish
entries: {@i tret de Genie a nivell 14}

You entreat your patron to grant you a small wish. Com a acció, you can speak your desire to your Genie's Vessel, requesting the effect of one spell that is 6th level or lower and has a casting time of 1 action. The spell can be from any class's spell list, and you don't need to meet the requirements in that spell, including costly components; the spell simply takes effect as part of this action.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi until you finish {@dice 1d4} long rests.

subclassFeature.name: The Noble Genie
entries: You made a pact with one of the rarest of geniekind, a noble genie. Such entities are rulers of vast fiefs on the Elemental Planes and have great influence over lesser genies and elemental creatures. Noble genies are varied in their motivations but are all arrogant collectors of creatures, knowledge, and treasure. A genie values their collection and will protect that which they claim ownership over. Through your connection to the noble, you can leverage their influence and extend their ownership of things in the multiverse.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: {@i tret de Noble Genie a nivell 1}
The Noble Genie et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

entries.caption: Conjurs Ampliats de Noble Genie
rows: {@spell crear menjar i aigua}, {@spell protegir de l'energia}

subclassFeature.name: Collector's Vessel
entries: {@i tret de Noble Genie a nivell 1}

Your patron gives you a magical vessel with which you can bind a creature to you and to your patron's menagerie. The vessel is a Tiny object, and it is a spellcasting focus for you. You decide what the object is, or you can determine what it is randomly by rolling on the Collector's Vessel table.

If you lose your vessel, you can perform a 1 hour ceremony to receive a replacement from your patron. This ceremony can be performed during a short or long rest, and it destroys the previous vessel. The vessel vanishes in a flare of elemental power when you die.

Com a acció while you are holding the vessel, you target a willing creature que puguis veure a 100 peus de tu and create a tether of wispy elemental material that links the target to you. The tether lasts durant 1 hora, until you use this feature to create another tether, until the bound target is reduced to 0 punts de vida, or until the target ends its turn more than 100 feet from you.
While you are tethered to a creature, reps els beneficis següents:

items: You gain a bonus to your Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) equal to el teu modificador de Carisma (minimum of +1).
When you can cast a spell, you can deliver the spell from your space or the bound creature's space.

entries: You can create the tether a number of times equal to el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim 1 cop), i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

entries.name: Collector's Vessel and Pact Boons
entries: When you create a tether with your Collector's Vessel, the tether takes on a form that reflects your patron's type of geniekind: swirling mist and wind for a {@creature djinni}, sand and flecks of rock or gems for a {@creature dao}, smoke and embers for an {@creature efreeti}, and foamy water for a {@creature marid}.

When you gain the Pact Boon feature a nivell 3, if you choose a boon that grants you a physical object, your vessel transforms into that object. For example, a warlock whose patron is a noble efreeti and chooses the Pact of the Tome might find their bottle transformed into an elaborate scroll made of a red dragon's wing, with brass and iron rolling rods.

subclassFeature.name: Elemental Resistance
entries: {@i tret de Noble Genie a nivell 6}
Your patron grants you protection from an element. Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you gain resistance to acid, cold, fire, or lightning damage (escull) until the end of your next long rest.
While the tether of your Collector's Vessel is active, the tethered creature gains resistance to the damage type you chose.

subclassFeature.name: Genie's Entertainment
entries: {@i tret de Noble Genie a nivell 10}

Com a acció, you attempt to send a creature que puguis veure within 90 feet to your patron's court. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Carisma contra la teva CD de salvada de conjur de bruixot or be magically drawn into your vessel and teleported to your patron's court in the Elemental Planes. While there, the target is {@condition stunned} and your patron marvels at the target with amusement but brings no harm to it. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, reappearing in the space it left or in the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied on a success.

Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg. If the target remains in your patron's court durant 1 minut, the genie sends the target back at the end of its turn as if it successfully saved, and you regain the use of this feature.

subclassFeature.name: Protective Wish
entries: {@i tret de Noble Genie a nivell 10}

You're now able to use your Collector's Vessel to wish for protection for yourself or your tethered creature. If you or the tethered creature is hit by an attack, pots, com a reacció, teleport, swapping places with the creature and switching which one of you is hit by the attack.

subclassFeature.name: Collector's Call
entries: {@i tret de Noble Genie a nivell 14}

In exchange for extending your patron's influence over the multiverse, you can call on more of their power. Com a acció, you can implore your patron for aid by making a Carisma ({@skill Persuasion}) contra la teva CD de salvada de conjur de bruixot. If the check succeeds, you can choose one of the following effects:

items: A creature que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu regains {@dice 8d6} hit points and ends one disease or condition afflicting it: {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, or {@condition poisoned}.
A creature que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu té desavantatge a tirades d'impacte and saving throws fins l'inici del teu proper torn.
You cast the {@spell recordar llegendes} spell without material components.

entries: Whether the check succeeds or fails, you can't use this feature again fins que acabis un descans llarg. Alternatively, you can regain the use of this feature by sacrificing nonmagical treasure worth at least 500 gp to your patron. This sacrifice requires the treasure to be a 10 peus de tu for at least 1 minute, at the end of which you use an action to teleport the treasure to your patron's realm, provided you have the vessel of your Collector's Vessel in hand.

subclassFeature.name: The Undead
entries: The Undead is an entity that resides in the dark corners of the multiverse. Your patron could be Acererak, Azalin, Lord Soth, Strahd, or some other ancient undead being. You may seek to gain knowledge from your patron's countless lifetimes of experience, while it may see you as a piece of a centuries long plan.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: {@i tret de Undead a nivell 1}
The Undead et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

entries.caption: Conjurs Ampliats de Undead
rows: {@spell parlar amb els morts}, {@spell muntura espectral}

subclassFeature.name: Form of Dread
entries: {@i tret de Undead a nivell 1}
You manifest an aspect of your patron's dreadful power. Com a acció bonus, you transform durant 1 minut. Reps els beneficis següents while transformed:

items: You gain punts de vida temporals equal to {@dice 1d10} + el teu nivell de bruixot.

Once during each of your turns, quan impactes a una criatura with an attack, you can force it to make a Saviesa saving throw, and if the saving throw fails, the target is {@condition frightened} de tu fins el final del teu proper torn.
You are immune to the {@condition frightened} condition.

entries: You can transform a number of times equal to el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

The appearance of your Form of Dread reflects some aspect of your patron. For example, your form could be a shroud of shadows forming the crown and robes of your lich patron, or your face might transform into bat-like features due to your vampire patron.

subclassFeature.name: Grave Touched
entries: {@i tret de Undead a nivell 6}
Your patron's powers have a profound effect on your body and magic. No et cal menjar, veure, ni respirar.

A més, quan impactes a una criatura with an attack and roll damage against the creature, you can replace the damage type with necrotic damage. While you are using your Form of Dread, you can roll one additional damage die when determining the necrotic damage L'objectiu rep.

subclassFeature.name: Mortal Husk
entries: {@i tret de Undead a nivell 10}

Your connection to undeath and necrotic energy now saturates your body. You have resistance to necrotic damage. If you are transformed using your Form of Dread, you instead become immune to necrotic damage.

A més, when you are reduced to 0 punts de vida, you can cause your body to explode. Tota criatura a 30 peus de tu takes necrotic damage equal to {@dice 2d10} + el teu nivell de bruixot. You then revive with 1 hit point in your previous space, along with your gear, and you gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}. Once you revive this way, you can't do so again until you finish {@dice 1d4} long rests.

subclassFeature.name: Spirit Projection
entries: {@i tret de Undead a nivell 14}
Your body is now simply a vessel for your spirit. Com a acció, you can project your spirit from your body. The body you leave behind is {@condition unconscious} and in a state of suspended animation.

Your spirit can remain outside your body for up to 1 hour or until your concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell). When your projection ends, your spirit returns to your body or your body magically teleports to your spirit's space (escull).
While projecting your spirit, reps els beneficis següents:

items: Your spirit and body gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
When you cast a spell of the conjuration or necromancy school, the spell doesn't require verbal, somatic, or material components that lack a gold cost.

Tens una velocitat de vol equivalent a la teva velocitat de caminar and can hover. You can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain, but you take {@damage 1d10} de dany de força if you end your turn inside a creature or an object.
While you are using your Form of Dread, once during each of your turns when you deal necrotic damage to a creature, you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entries: Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un descans llarg.

subclassFeature.name: The Genie
entries: You have made a pact with one of the rarest kinds of genie, a noble genie. Such entities are rulers of vast fiefs on the Elemental Planes and have great influence over lesser genies and elemental creatures. Noble genies are varied in their motivations but are all arrogant and wield power that rivals that of lesser deities. They delight in turning the table on mortals who so love to bind genies into servitude, readily entering into pacts that expand their reach across the multiverse.
You choose your patron's kind or determine it randomly, using the Genie Kind table. Each kind of genie is associated with a particular element, as shown in the table.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: {@i tret de Genie a nivell 1}

The Genie lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. The Genie Expanded Spells table shows the genie spells that are added to the llista de conjurs de bruixot for you, along with the spells associated in the table with your patron's kind: dao, djinni, efreeti, or marid.

entries.caption: Conjurs Ampliats de Genie
rows: {@spell detectar el bé i el mal}

subclassFeature.name: Genie's Vessel
entries: {@i tret de Genie a nivell 1}

Your patron gifts you a magical vessel that grants you a measure of the genie's power. The vessel is a Tiny object, and you can use it as a spellcasting focus for your warlock spells. You decide what the object is, or you can determine what it is randomly by rolling on the Genie's Vessel table.
While you are touching the vessel, you can use it in the following ways:

items.name: Bottled Respite.
items.entry: Com a acció, you can magically vanish and enter your vessel, which remains in the space you left. The interior of the vessel is an extradimensional space in the shape of a 20-foot-radius cylinder, 20 feet high, and resembles your vessel. The interior is comfortably appointed with cushions and low tables and is a comfortable temperature. While inside, you can hear the area around your vessel as if you were in its space. You can remain inside the vessel up to a number of hours equal to twice el teu bonus de competència. You exit the vessel early if you use a bonus action to leave, if you die, or if the vessel is destroyed. When you exit the vessel, you appear in the unoccupied space closest to it. Any objects left in the vessel remain there until carried out, and if the vessel is destroyed, every object stored there harmlessly appears in the unoccupied spaces closest to the vessel's former space. Once you enter the vessel, you can't enter again fins que acabis un descans llarg.

items.name: Genie's Wrath.
items.entry: Once during each of your turns when you hit with an attack roll, you can deal extra damage to the target equal to el teu bonus de competència. The type of this damage is determined by your patron: bludgeoning (dao), thunder (djinni), fire (efreeti), or cold (marid).

entries: The vessel's AC equals your spell save DC. Its hit points equal el teu nivell de bruixot plus el teu bonus de competència, and it is immune to poison and psychic damage.

If the vessel is destroyed or you lose it, you can perform a 1-hour ceremony to receive a replacement from your patron. This ceremony can be performed during a short or long rest, and the previous vessel is destroyed if it still exists. The vessel vanishes in a flare of elemental power when you die.

subclassFeature.name: Elemental Gift
entries: {@i tret de Genie a nivell 6}

You begin to take on characteristics of your patron's kind. You now have resistance to a damage type determined by your patron's kind: bludgeoning (dao), thunder (djinni), fire (efreeti), or cold (marid).

A més, com a acció bonus, you can give yourself a flying speed of 30 feet that lasts durant 10 minuts, during which pots flotar. You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Sanctuary Vessel
entries: {@i tret de Genie a nivell 10}

When you enter your Genie's Vessel via the Bottled Respite feature, you can now choose up to five willing creatures que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu, and les criatures designades are drawn into the vessel with you.
Com a acció bonus, you can eject any number of creatures from the vessel, and everyone is ejected if you leave or the vessel is destroyed.

A més, anyone (including you) who remains within the vessel for at least 10 minutes gains the benefit of finishing a short rest, and anyone can add el teu bonus de competència to the number of hit points they regain if they spend any Hit Dice as part of a short rest there.

subclassFeature.name: Limited Wish
entries: {@i tret de Genie a nivell 14}

You entreat your patron to grant you a small wish. Com a acció, you can speak your desire to your Genie's Vessel, requesting the effect of one spell that is 6th level or lower and has a casting time of 1 action. The spell can be from any class's spell list, and you don't need to meet the requirements in that spell, including costly components; the spell simply takes effect as part of this action.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi until you finish {@dice 1d4} long rests.

subclassFeature.name: The Undying Light
entries: Your patron is not a specific entity, but the energy that radiates from the Positive Plane. Your pact allows you to experience the barest touch of the raw stuff of life that powers the multiverse. Anything more, and you would be instantly incinerated by its energy.

Contact with the Positive Plane causes subtle changes to your behavior and beliefs. You are driven to bring light to dark places, to annihilate undead creatures, and to protect all living things. At the same time, you crave the light and find total darkness a suffocating experience akin to drowning.
As an optional way to add more flavor to your character, you can pick from or roll on the following table of flaws associated with warlocks of the Undying Light.

entries.caption: Undying Light Flaws
rows: You are afraid of the dark, and must always have a light source at hand.
You have a nervous compulsion to keep a bright light in even the barest shadow.
You have a compulsion to enter and illuminate dark areas.
You have an overwhelming hatred of undead creatures.
You fidget and are irritable when you can't see the sun.
In a dark area, you always carry a lit torch or lantern. Putting it down is an unbearable thought.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: The Undying Light et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

subclassFeature.name: Radiant Soul
entries: Començant a nivell 1, your link to the Positive Plane allows you to serve as a conduit for radiant energy. You have resistance to radiant damage, and when you cast a spell that deals radiant damage or fire damage, you add el teu modificador de Carisma to that damage. A més, you know the {@spell flama sagrada} i {@spell llum} cantrips and can cast them at will. They don't count against your number of cantrips known.

subclassFeature.name: Searing Vengeance
entries: Començant a nivell 6, the radiant energy you channel allows you to overcome grievous injuries. When you would make a salvada de mort, you can instead spring back to your feet with a burst of radiant energy. You immediately stand up (if you so choose), and you regain hit points equal to half els teus punts de vida màxims. All hostile creatures a 30 peus de tu take 10 + el teu modificador de Carisma radiant damage and are {@condition blinded} until the end of your turn.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Radiant Resilience
entries: Començant a nivell 10, you gain punts de vida temporals whenever you finish a long or short rest. These punts de vida temporals equal el teu nivell de bruixot + el teu modificador de Carisma. A més, choose up to five creatures que puguis veure at the end of your rest. Those creatures gain punts de vida temporals equal to half el teu nivell de bruixot + el teu modificador de Carisma.

subclassFeature.name: Healing Light
entries: A nivell 14, you gain the ability to channel the Undying Light to heal yourself and other creatures. Com a acció bonus, you can touch a creature and heal it. With each touch, a creature regains from {@dice 1d6} to {@dice 5d6} hit points (escull). You have a total pool of {@dice 15d6} you can expend. Subtract the dice you use with each touch from that total.
You regain all expended dice from your pool quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Ghost in the Machine
entries: You have made a bargain for power granted by an entity that you believe to be completely digital. Whether it is a rogue AI or the spirit of a deceased hacker, the Ghost in the Machine is capable of feats that defy explanation.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: The Ghost in the Machine lets you choose from an expanded list of spells when you learn a warlock spell. You gain the on/off cantrip, and the following new spells are added to the llista de conjurs de bruixot for you.
Spells marked with an asterisk can be found in Unearthed Arcana: Modern Magic.

entries.caption: Conjurs Ampliats de Ghost in the Machine
rows: {@spell infallible relay (UA)|UAModernMagic|infallible relay}*, {@spell remote access (UA)|UAModernMagic|remote access}*
{@spell arcane hacking (UA)|UAModernMagic|arcane hacking}*, {@spell digital phantom (UA)|UAModernMagic|digital phantom}*
{@spell haywire (UA)|UAModernMagic|haywire}*, {@spell invisibility to cameras (UA)|UAModernMagic|invisibility to cameras}*
{@spell conjure knowbot (UA)|UAModernMagic|conjure knowbot}*, {@spell system backdoor (UA)|UAModernMagic|system backdoor}*

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiency
entries: A nivell 1, you gain proficiency with hacking tools.

subclassFeature.name: Information Surge
entries: A nivell 1, you gain the ability to temporarily render computerized devices inoperable. Com a acció, you can target a computerized device a 30 peus de tu. If the targeted device is held or otherwise actively used by a living creature, that creature ha de salvar per Intel·ligència against your spell save DC. Si falla, the targeted device ceases to function fins el final del teu proper torn. If the targeted device is not held or used by a creature, the DM makes a special saving throw for the device with disadvantage and a +0 modifier. Certain shielded devices might negate the disadvantage, at the DM's determination.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Wire Walk
entries: Començant a nivell 6, you gain the ability to travel short distances over electrical wires, data lines, or telephone cables. Com a acció bonus, you can touch a device or socket connected to a hardwired network and teleport along this network to another device or socket within your line of sight. Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Personal Encryption
entries: Començant a nivell 10, you have learned to apply your innate knowledge of encryption to your thoughts, memories, and presence. Tens avantatge a saving throws against {@spell scrying}, thought detection, or any other method of magically learning your whereabouts or reading your thoughts. For any such effect that does not grant you a saving throw but which requires the creature targeting you to make an ability check, the check is made with disadvantage.

subclassFeature.name: Technovirus
entries: A nivell 14, you gain the ability to infect a humanoid's body with living circuitry. You can use an action to make a atac cos a cos against a humanoid creature using el teu modificador d'atac de conjurs. L'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució against your spell save DC as a techno-organic virus quickly spreads through its body. Si falla, L'objectiu rep {@damage 8d10} de dany psíquic, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

A més, if the target fails the saving throw, you can use an action to issue it a single command, as if you were casting the {@spell ordre imperativa} spell. The target makes its saving throw against your {@spell ordre imperativa} with disadvantage. You can issue this {@spell ordre imperativa} at any time while the target remains infected.

Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg, at which point the target is cured of the technovirus. The infection can also be removed with a {@spell restabliment menor} spell.

subclassFeature.name: The Celestial
entries: Your patron is a powerful being of els Plans Superiors. You have bound yourself to an ancient empyrean, solar, ki-rin, or unicorn or to another entity that resides in the planes of everlasting bliss. Your pact with that being allows you to experience the barest touch of the holy light that illuminates the multiverse.

Being connected to such power can cause changes in your behavior and beliefs. You might find yourself driven to annihilate the undead, to defeat fiends, and to protect the innocent. At times, your heart might also be filled with a longing for the celestial realm of your patron, a desire to wander that paradise for the rest of your days. But you know that your mission is among mortals for now and that your pact binds you to bring light to the dark places of the world.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: The Celestial et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

entries.caption: Conjurs Ampliats de Celestial
rows: {@spell guardià de fe}, {@spell paret de foc}

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Cantrips
entries: A nivell 1, you learn the {@spell flama sagrada} i {@spell llum} cantrips. They count as warlock cantrips for you, but they don't count against your number of cantrips known.

subclassFeature.name: Healing Light
entries: A nivell 1, you gain the ability to channel celestial energy to heal wounds. You have a pool of {@dice d6}s that you spend to fuel this healing. The number of dice in the pool equals 1 + el teu nivell de bruixot.

Com a acció bonus, you can touch a creature and heal it, spending dice from the pool. The maximum number of dice you can spend at once equals el teu modificador de Carisma (minimum of one die). Roll the dice you spend, add them together, and restore a number of hit points equal to the total.
Your pool regains all expended dice quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Radiant Soul
entries: Començant a nivell 6, your link to the Celestial allows you to serve as a conduit for radiant energy. You have resistance to radiant damage, and when you cast a spell that deals radiant or fire damage, you add el teu modificador de Carisma to that damage against un objectiu (escull).

subclassFeature.name: Celestial Resilience
entries: Començant a nivell 10, you gain punts de vida temporals quan acabis un descans curt o llarg. These punts de vida temporals equal el teu nivell de bruixot + el teu modificador de Carisma. A més, choose up to five creatures que puguis veure at the end of the rest. Those creatures each gain punts de vida temporals equal to half el teu nivell de bruixot + el teu modificador de Carisma.

subclassFeature.name: Healing Light
entries: Començant a nivell 14, the radiant energy you channel allows you to overcome grievous injuries. When you have to make a salvada de mort at the start of your turn, you can instead spring back to your feet with a burst of radiant energy. You regain hit points equal to half els teus punts de vida màxims, and then you stand up, if you so choose. Tota criatura que designis that is a 30 peus de tu takes radiant damage equal to {@dice 2d8} + el teu modificador de Carisma, and it is {@condition blinded} fins el final del torn actual.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: The Lurker in the Deep
entries: You made a pact with an entity that lurks somewhere deep in the ocean, or even on the Elemental Plane of Water, such as a mighty kraken, an ancient primordial, or a monstrous being from creation's earliest days. You serve as this creature's eyes and ears, watching the world beyond its domain and reporting your findings. You may have gained this pact as a member of a cult dedicated to the entity or after your patron saved your life when you nearly drowned at sea.

entries.subclassFeature: The Lurker's Clutches|Bruixot||Lurker in the Deep (UA)|UASorcererAndWarlock|1

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: {@i tret de Lurker in the Deep a nivell 1}
The Lurker in the Deep et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

entries.caption: Conjurs Ampliats de Lurker
rows: {@spell comunió amb la natura}, {@spell con de fred}

entries.subclassFeature: Grasp of the Deep|Bruixot||Lurker in the Deep (UA)|UASorcererAndWarlock|1
Scion of the Deep|Bruixot||Lurker in the Deep (UA)|UASorcererAndWarlock|1

subclassFeature.name: Grasp of the Deep
entries: {@i tret de Lurker in the Deep a nivell 1}

A nivell 1, you gain the ability to magically summon a spectral tentacle that strikes at your foes. Com a acció bonus, you create a 10-foot-long tentacle at a point que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu. The tentacle lasts durant 1 minut or until you use this feature to create another tentacle.

When you create the tentacle, you can make a atac màgic cos a cos against a creature within 10 feet of it. On a hit, L'objectiu rep {@damage 1d8} cold or lightning damage (your choice when it takes the damage) and its speed is reduced by 10 feet fins l'inici del teu proper torn. Quan arribes a nivell 10 in this class, the damage dealt by the tentacle increases to {@dice 2d8}.

Com a acció bonus en el teu torn, you can move the tentacle fins a 30 peus and repeat the attack. You can summon the tentacle a number of times equal to el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim 1 cop), i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Scion of the Deep
entries: {@i tret de Lurker in the Deep a nivell 1}

A nivell 1, your patron accepts you into its inner court of servitors. You can telepathically communicate with any aberration, beast, elemental, or monstrosity that has an innate swimming speed, while it is a 120 peus de tu. The creature can understand you and can respond telepathically.

subclassFeature.name: The Lurker's Clutches
entries: Several features of the Lurker in the Deep create tentacles or a maw that reach into the world. The form of these appendages should reflect the nature of your specific patron. For example, a kraken's warlock might summon great squid-like tentacles, serrated crab claws, or a massive octopus beak, while the servant of a primordial water elemental might create tendrils or swells of living water.

subclassFeature.name: Fathomless Soul
entries: {@i tret de Lurker in the Deep a nivell 6}
A nivell 6, your patron grants you greater abilities. Reps els beneficis següents:

items: You can breathe both air and water.
Obténs una velocitat de natació equivalent a la teva velocitat de caminar.
You gain resistance to cold damage.

subclassFeature.name: Guardian Grasp
entries: {@i tret de Lurker in the Deep a nivell 6}

A nivell 6, the tentacle you create with Grasp of the Deep can defend you and others. When you or a creature que puguis veure takes damage while within 10 feet of the tentacle, pots, com a reacció, choose one of those creatures and reduce the damage to la criatura designada by half. After doing so, the tentacle vanishes.

subclassFeature.name: Devouring Maw
entries: {@i tret de Lurker in the Deep a nivell 10}

Començant a nivell 10, you can magically draw forth a manifestation of your patron's insatiable hunger. Com a acció, choose a point que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu. Durant 1 minut, a translucent maw manifests in a 10-foot radius centered on that point. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea when the maw appears ha de salvar per Força. against your spell save DC or be {@condition restrained}. Any creature that starts its turn in the maw's area takes {@damage 3d6} cold or lightning damage (your choice when it takes the damage). Com a acció, a {@condition restrained} creature can repeat the saving throw, ending the restraint on a success. At the start of your turn, if there is a creature in the maw's area, you gain punts de vida temporals equal to el teu nivell de bruixot.
Once you use this feature, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Unleash the Depths
entries: {@i tret de Lurker in the Deep a nivell 14}

Començant a nivell 14, you gain the ability to call upon your patron for aid. Com a acció, you choose a point a 30 peus de tu where your patron tears through reality, manifesting a measure of its thalassic grandeur. Choose one of the following effects to issue from this manifestation point. Once you use either effect, you can't use this feature again fins que acabis un descans llarg.

entries.name: Transport
entries: You and up to five willing creatures (escull) que puguis veure within 30 feet of the manifestation point are grasped by spectral tentacles and yanked through your patron's realm. The tentacles teleport you and les criatures designades to a point (escull) within 100 miles that you have visited within the past 24 hours. The tentacles then vanish.

entries.name: Fury
entries: You can direct a barrage of spectral tentacles to issue forth and strike up to five creatures que puguis veure within 30 feet of the manifestation point. Each target ha de salvar per Destresa against your spell save DC. Si falla, the creature takes {@damage 6d10} cold or lightning damage (escull) and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}. The tentacles then vanish.

subclassFeature.name: The Seeker
entries: Your patron is an inscrutable being who travels the Astral Plane in search of knowledge and secrets. In return for your patron's gifts, you wander the world seeking lore that you can share with the Seeker.

Your patron could be any deity or other powerful entity dedicated to knowledge or forgotten lore. Celestian is an ideal patron for a Greyhawk campaign, and was the inspiration for this concept. In the Regnes Oblidats, your patron might be Azuth or Oghma. Aureon makes an excellent patron in Eberron, while in Krynn and the Dragonlance campaign setting, Gilean is a good match for the Seeker's role.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: The Seeker et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

subclassFeature.name: Shielding Aurora
entries: Començant a nivell 1, you can invoke the Seeker's power to protect you from harm. Com a acció bonus, you create a whirling aurora of brilliant energy that swirls around you. Fins el final del teu proper torn, you gain resistance to all damage, and if a hostile creature ends its turn a 10 peus de tu, it takes radiant damage equal to el teu nivell de bruixot + el teu modificador de Carisma.
Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Astral Refuge
entries: A nivell 6, you gain the ability to step into an astral refuge. Com a acció, you disappear from the world for a brief moment and enter the Astral Plane, taking advantage of its timeless nature. While in your astral refuge, you can take two actions to cast spells that target only you. After using those two actions, you return to the space you occupied and your turn ends.

subclassFeature.name: Far Wanderer
entries: A nivell 10, you no longer need to breathe, and you gain resistance to fire damage and cold damage.

subclassFeature.name: Astral Sequestration
entries: Començant a nivell 14, you gain the ability to sequester yourself and your allies on the Astral Plane.

By performing a special ritual over the course of 5 minutes, you shift yourself and up to ten willing creatures que puguis veure to the Astral Plane. You and those creatures gain the benefits of a short rest while sequestered on the Astral Plane. You then return to the spaces you all occupied when you used this ability, with no time having passed in the world.
During this short rest, you and the creatures you sequester can make use of any options available during a rest that affect only you and the creatures you sequester.
Once you use this ability, you cannot use it again until you complete a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: The Hexblade
entries: You have made your pact with a powerful, sentient magic weapon carved from the stuff of the Erm de l'Ombra. The mighty sword Blackrazor is the most notable of these weapons, several of which have spread across the multiverse over the ages. These weapons grow stronger as they consume the life essence of their victims. The strongest of them can use their ties to the Erm de l'Ombra to offer power to mortals who serve them. The Raven Queen forged the first of these weapons. They, along with the hexblade warlocks, are another tool she can use to manipulate events in the Pla Material to her inscrutable ends.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: The Hexblade et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

subclassFeature.name: Hex Warrior
entries: A nivell 1, you gain proficiency with medium armor, shields, and martial weapons. A més, when attacking with a melee weapon that you are proficient with and that lacks the two-handed property, you can use el teu modificador de Carisma, instead of Força or Destresa, for the attack and damage rolls.

subclassFeature.name: Hexblade's Curse
entries: Començant a nivell 1, you gain the ability to place a baleful curse on an enemy. Com a acció bonus, choose one creature que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. The target is cursed durant 1 minut. Until the curse ends, reps els beneficis següents:

items: You gain a bonus to damage rolls against the cursed target. The bonus equals el teu bonus de competència.
Any attack roll you make against the cursed target is a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.
If the cursed target dies, you regain hit points equal to el teu nivell de bruixot + el teu modificador de Carisma.

entries: You can't use this feature again fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Shadow Hound
entries: Començant a nivell 6, your shadow can split from you and transform into a hound of pure darkness. Most of the time, your shadow hound masquerades as your normal shadow. Com a acció bonus, you can command it to magically slip into the shadow of a creature que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu. While the shadow hound is merged in this manner, the target can't gain the benefits of half cover or three-quarters cover against your attack rolls, and you know the distance and direction to the target even if it is hidden. The hound can't be seen by anyone but you and those with {@sense truesight}, and it is unaffected by light. The target has a vague feeling of dread while the hound is present.

Com a acció bonus, you can command your shadow hound to return to you. It also automatically returns to you if you and the target are on different planes of existence, if you're {@condition incapacitated}, or if dispel magic, {@spell remove curse}, or similar magic is used on the target.

subclassFeature.name: Armor of Hexes
entries: A nivell 10, your hex grows more powerful. If the target cursed by your Hexblade's Curse t'impacta amb un atac, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 4 or higher, the attack instead misses you.

subclassFeature.name: Master of Hexes
entries: Començant a nivell 14, you can use your Hexblade's Curse again without resting, but when you apply it to a new target, the curse immediately ends on the previous target.

subclassFeature.name: The Raven Queen
entries: Your patron is the Raven Queen, a mysterious being who rules the Erm de l'Ombra from a palace of ice deep within that dread realm. The Raven Queen watches over the world, anticipating tota criatura's death and ensuring that it meets its end at the proscribed time and place. As the ruler of the Erm de l'Ombra, she dwells in a decayed, dark reflection of the world. Her ability to reach into the world is limited. Thus, she turns to mortal warlocks to serve her will. Warlocks sworn to the Raven Queen receive visions and whispers from her in their dreams, sending them on quests and warning them of impending dangers.

The Raven Queen's followers are expected to serve her will in the world. She concerns herself with ensuring that those fated to die pass from the world as expected, and bids her agents to defeat those who seek to cheat death through undeath or other imitations of immortality. She hates intelligent undead and expects her followers to strike them down, whereas mindless undead such as skeletons and zombies are little more than stumbling automatons in her eyes.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: The Raven Queen et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

entries.caption: Conjurs Ampliats de Raven Queen
rows: {@spell feign death}, {@spell parlar amb els morts}

subclassFeature.name: Sentinel Raven
entries: Començant a nivell 1, you gain the service of a spirit sent by the Raven Queen to watch over you. The spirit assumes the form and game statistics of a {@creature raven}, and it always obeys your commands, which you can give telepathically while it is a 100 peus de tu.

While the raven is perched on your shoulder, you gain {@sense darkvision} amb un abast de 30 peus and a bonus to your passive Saviesa ({@skill Perception}) score and to Saviesa ({@skill Perception}). The bonus equals el teu modificador de Carisma. While perched on your shoulder, the raven can't be targeted by any attack or other harmful effect; only you can cast spells on it; it can't take damage; and it is {@condition incapacitated}.

You can see through the raven's eyes and hear what it hears while it is a 100 peus de tu. In combat, you roll initiative for the raven and control how it acts. If it is slain by a creature, you gain advantage on all attack rolls against the killer durant les properes 24 hores.

The raven doesn't require sleep. While it is a 100 peus de tu, it can awaken you from sleep com a acció bonus. The raven vanishes when it dies, if you die, or if the two of you are separated by more than 5 miles.
At the end of a short or long rest, you can call the raven back to you—no matter where it is or whether it died—and it reappears a 5 peus de tu.

subclassFeature.name: Soul of the Raven
entries: A nivell 6, you gain the ability to merge with your raven spirit. Com a acció bonus when your raven is perched on your shoulder, your body merges with your raven's form. While merged, you become Tiny, you replace your speed with the raven's, and pots, com a acció, only to {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, {@action Dodge}, {@action Help}, {@action Hide}, or {@action Search}. During this time, you gain the benefits of your raven being perched on your shoulder. Com a acció, you and the raven return to normal.

subclassFeature.name: Raven's Shield
entries: A nivell 10, the Raven Queen grants you a protective blessing. You gain advantage on salvades de mort, immunity to the {@condition frightened} condition, and resistance to necrotic damage.

subclassFeature.name: Queen's Right Hand
entries: Començant a nivell 14, you can channel the Raven Queen's power to slay a creature. You can cast {@spell finger of death}. Un cop llances el conjur mitjançant aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un descans llarg.

subclassFeature.name: The Undead
entries: You've made a pact with a deathless being, a creature that defies the cycle and life and death, forsaking its mortal shell so it might eternally pursue its unfathomable ambitions. For such beings, time and morality are fleeting things, the concerns of those for whom grains of sand still rush through life's hourglass. Having once been mortal themselves, these ancient undead know firsthand the paths of ambition and the routes past the doors of death. They eagerly share this profane knowledge, along with other secrets, with those who work their will among the living.

Beings of this type include the demilich Acererak, the vampire tyrant Kas the Bloody-Handed, the githyanki lich-queen Vlaakith, the dracolich Dragotha, the undead pharaoh Ankhtepot, and the elusive Darklord, Azalin Rex.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: {@i tret de Undead a nivell 1}
The Undead et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

entries.caption: Conjurs Ampliats de Undead
rows: {@spell muntura espectral}, {@spell parlar amb els morts}

subclassFeature.name: Form of Dread
entries: {@i tret de Undead a nivell 1}
You manifest an aspect of your patron's dreadful power. Com a acció bonus, you transform durant 1 minut. Reps els beneficis següents while transformed:

items: You gain punts de vida temporals equal to {@dice 1d10} + el teu nivell de bruixot.

Once during each of your turns, quan impactes a una criatura with an attack roll, you can force it to make a Saviesa saving throw, and if the saving throw fails, the target is {@condition frightened} de tu fins el final del teu proper torn.
You are immune to the {@condition frightened} condition.

entries: You can transform a number of times equal to el teu bonus de competència, i en recuperes tots els usos quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

The appearance of your Form of Dread reflects some aspect of your patron. For example, your form could be a shroud of shadows forming the crown and robes of your lich patron, or your body might glow with glyphs from ancient funerary rites and be surrounded by desert winds, suggesting your mummy patron.

subclassFeature.name: Grave Touched
entries: {@i tret de Undead a nivell 6}
Your patron's powers have a profound effect on your body and magic. No et cal menjar, veure, ni respirar.

A més, once during each of your turns, quan impactes a una criatura with an attack roll and roll damage against the creature, you can replace the damage type with necrotic damage. While you are using your Form of Dread, you can roll one additional damage die when determining the necrotic damage L'objectiu rep.

subclassFeature.name: Necrotic Husk
entries: {@i tret de Undead a nivell 10}

Your connection to undeath and necrotic energy now saturates your body. You have resistance to necrotic damage. If you are transformed using your Form of Dread, you instead become immune to necrotic damage.

A més, when you would be reduced to 0 punts de vida, pots, com a reacció, drop to 1 hit point instead and cause your body to erupt with deathly energy. Tota criatura que designis that is a 30 peus de tu takes necrotic damage equal to {@damage 2d10} + el teu nivell de bruixot. You then gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}. Once you use this reaction, you can't do so again until you finish {@dice 1d4} long rests.

subclassFeature.name: Spirit Projection
entries: {@i tret de Undead a nivell 14}

Your spirit can become untethered from your physical form. Com a acció, you can project your spirit from your body. The body you leave behind is {@condition unconscious} and in a state of suspended animation.

Your spirit resembles your mortal form in almost every way, replicating your game statistics but not your possessions. Any damage or other effects that apply to your spirit or physical body affects the other. Your spirit can remain outside your body for up to 1 hour or until your concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell). When your projection ends, your spirit returns to your body or your body magically teleports to your spirit's space (escull).
While projecting your spirit, reps els beneficis següents:

items: Your spirit and body gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
When you cast a spell of the conjuration or necromancy school, the spell doesn't require verbal or somatic components or material components that lack a gold cost.

Tens una velocitat de vol equivalent a la teva velocitat de caminar and can hover. You can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain, but you rep {@dice 1d10} de dany de força if you end your turn inside a creature or an object.
While you are using your Form of Dread, once during each of your turns when you deal necrotic damage to a creature, you regain hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entries: Un cop empris aquest tret, no pots tornar-hi fins que acabis un descans llarg.

subclassFeature.name: The Celestial
entries: Your patron is a powerful being of els Plans Superiors. You have bound yourself to an ancient empyrean, solar, ki-rin, unicorn, or other entity that resides in the planes of everlasting bliss. Your pact with that being allows you to experience the barest touch of the holy light that illuminates the multiverse.

Being connected to such power can cause changes in your behavior and beliefs. You might find yourself driven to annihilate the undead, to defeat fiends, and to protect the innocent. At times, your heart might also be filled with a longing for the celestial realm of your patron, and a desire to wander that paradise for the rest of your days. But you know that your mission is among mortals for now, and that your pact binds you to bring light to the dark places of the world.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: The Celestial et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

entries.caption: Conjurs Ampliats de Celestial
rows: {@spell guardià de fe}, {@spell paret de foc}

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Cantrips
entries: A nivell 1, you learn the {@spell flama sagrada} i {@spell llum} cantrips. They count as warlock cantrips for you, but they don't count against your number of cantrips known.

subclassFeature.name: Healing Light
entries: A nivell 1, you gain the ability to channel celestial energy to heal wounds. You have a pool of {@dice d6}s that you spend to fuel this healing. The number of dice in the pool equals 1 + el teu nivell de bruixot.

Com a acció bonus, you can heal one creature que puguis veure a 60 peus de tu, spending dice from the pool. The maximum number of dice you can spend at once equals el teu modificador de Carisma (minimum of one die). Roll the dice you spend, add them together, and restore a number of hit points equal to the total.
Your pool regains all expended dice quan acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Radiant Soul
entries: Començant a nivell 6, your link to the Celestial allows you to serve as a conduit for radiant energy. You have resistance to radiant damage, and when you cast a spell that deals radiant or fire damage, you can add el teu modificador de Carisma to one radiant or fire damage roll of that spell against one of its targets.

subclassFeature.name: Celestial Resilience
entries: Començant a nivell 10, you gain punts de vida temporals quan acabis un descans curt o llarg. These punts de vida temporals equal el teu nivell de bruixot + el teu modificador de Carisma. A més, choose up to five creatures que puguis veure at the end of the rest. Those creatures each gain punts de vida temporals equal to half el teu nivell de bruixot + el teu modificador de Carisma.

subclassFeature.name: Searing Vengeance
entries: Començant a nivell 14, the radiant energy you channel allows you to resist death. When you have to make a salvada de mort at the start of your turn, you can instead spring back to your feet with a burst of radiant energy. You regain hit points equal to half els teus punts de vida màxims, and then you stand up if you so choose. Tota criatura que designis that is a 30 peus de tu takes radiant damage equal to {@dice 2d8} + el teu modificador de Carisma, and it is {@condition blinded} fins el final del torn actual.
Quan empris aquest tret, no hi pots tornar fins que acabis un Descans Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: The Hexblade
entries: You have made your pact with a mysterious entity from the Erm de l'Ombra—a force that manifests in sentient magic weapons carved from the stuff of shadow. The mighty sword Blackrazor is the most notable of these weapons, which have been spread across the multiverse over the ages. The shadowy force behind these weapons can offer power to warlocks who form pacts with it. Many hexblade warlocks create weapons that emulate those formed in the Erm de l'Ombra. Others forgo such arms, content to weave the dark magic of that plane into their spellcasting.

Because the Raven Queen is known to have forged the first of these weapons, many sages speculate that she and the force are one and that the weapons, along with hexblade warlocks, are tools she uses to manipulate events on the Pla Material to her inscrutable ends.

entries.name: Llista de Conjurs Ampliada
entries: The Hexblade et permet escollir conjurs adicionals quan aprèns un conjur de bruixot. Els conjurs se t'afegeixen a la llista de conjurs de bruixot disponibles.

subclassFeature.name: Hex Warrior
entries: A nivell 1, you acquire the training necessary to effectively arm yourself for battle. You gain proficiency with medium armor, shields, and martial weapons.

The influence of your patron also allows you to mystically channel your will through a particular weapon. Quan acabis un Descans Llarg, you can touch one weapon that you are proficient with and that lacks the two-handed property. When you attack with that weapon, you can use el teu modificador de Carisma, instead of Força or Destresa, for the attack and damage rolls. This benefit lasts fins que acabis un descans llarg. If you later gain the Pact of the Blade feature, this benefit extends to every pact weapon you conjure with that feature, no matter the weapon's type.

subclassFeature.name: Hexblade's Curse
entries: Començant a nivell 1, you gain the ability to place a baleful curse on someone. Com a acció bonus, choose one creature que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu. The target is cursed durant 1 minut. The curse ends early if the target dies, you die, or you are {@condition incapacitated}. Until the curse ends, reps els beneficis següents:

items: You gain a bonus to damage rolls against the cursed target. The bonus equals el teu bonus de competència.
Any attack roll you make against the cursed target is a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.
If the cursed target dies, you regain hit points equal to el teu nivell de bruixot + el teu modificador de Carisma (mínim d'1 punt de vida).

entries: You can't use this feature again fins que acabis un Descans Curt o Llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Accursed Specter
entries: Començant a nivell 6, you can curse the soul of a person you slay, temporarily binding it to your service. When you slay a humanoid, you can cause its spirit to rise from its corpse as a {@creature specter}, the statistics for which are in the Monster Manual. When the specter appears, it gains punts de vida temporals equal to half el teu nivell de bruixot. Roll initiative for the specter, which has its own turns. It obeys your verbal commands, and it gains a special bonus to its attack rolls equal to el teu modificador de Carisma (minimum of +0).
The specter remains in your service until the end of your next long rest, at which point it vanishes to the afterlife.
Once you bind a specter with this feature, you can't use the feature again fins que acabis un descans llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Armor of Hexes
entries: A nivell 10, your hex grows more powerful. If the target cursed by your Hexblade's Curse t'impacta amb un atac, pots, com a reacció, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 4 or higher, the attack instead misses you, regardless of its roll.

subclassFeature.name: Master of Hexes
entries: Començant a nivell 14, you can spread your Hexblade's Curse from a slain creature to another creature. When the creature cursed by your Hexblade's Curse dies, you can apply the curse to a different creature que puguis veure a 30 peus de tu, provided you aren't {@condition incapacitated}. When you apply the curse in this way, you don't regain hit points from the death of the previously cursed creature.

subclassFeature.name: Bottled Respite
entries: Com a acció, you can magically vanish and enter your vessel, which remains in the space you left. The interior of the vessel is an extradimensional space in the shape of a 20-foot-radius cylinder, 20 feet high, and resembles your vessel. The interior is appointed with cushions and low tables and is a comfortable temperature. While inside, you can hear the area around your vessel as if you were in its space. You can remain inside the vessel up to a number of hours equal to twice el teu bonus de competència. You exit the vessel early if you use a bonus action to leave, if you die, or if the vessel is destroyed. When you exit the vessel, you appear in the unoccupied space closest to it. Any objects left in the vessel remain there until carried out, and if the vessel is destroyed, every object stored there harmlessly appears in the unoccupied spaces closest to the vessel's former space. Once you enter the vessel, you can't enter again fins que acabis un descans llarg.

subclassFeature.name: Genie's Wrath
entries: Once during each of your turns when you hit with an attack roll, you can deal extra damage to the target equal to el teu bonus de competència. The type of this damage is determined by your patron: bludgeoning (dao), thunder (djinni), fire (efreeti), or cold (marid).
